title: Makupa Circus
text:
The Makupa Circus is a primary road junction in <a href="Mombasa">Mombasa</a>, <a href="Kenya">Kenya</a>. The <a href="roundabout">roundabout</a> is situated in the Makupa area of <a href="Mombasa%20Island">the island</a>.
The roundabout serves the majority of migrating traffic in Mombasa. It is the first major road junction on the island after transversing the <a href="Makupa%20Causeway">Makupa Causeway</a>, and forms the northern terminus of <a href="Jomo%20Kenyatta%20Avenue">Jomo Kenyatta Avenue</a>.
Elim <a href="Evangelical">Evangelical</a> Church lies to the west of the roundabout.
